TopicTitle: Howdy, The Space Cowboy, 'Coyote' is ready to launch

Articles.Content:
Howdy folks, My real name is Paul, and I'm from Tucson, Arizona, USA. Of ocurse folks Call me the Space Cowboy, and I wqas Introduced to this game by a Fellow gamer who got me hooked on this game..

Folks Call me "The Space Cowboy". But my callsign is "Coyote" and I'm probably one of the "Old school rocket designers from roughly the start of Manned flight (Was born just about 10 month after John Glenn (Kerman) got into orbit the first time back in 1962.

And I've sen it all.. and Even almost 50 years later, I still enjoy the thrill of space.

And this cowboy is ready to start a company to see if we can get into orbit, to the Mun, and on to Minmus and Beyond.

Expect News of the New Company in a future post..

Space_Coyote

Tucson, Arizona.
